toomany.title: Too Many
toomany.message: If you drank more than 7 cups of coffee during the day, regardless when you plan to go to sleep.

toolate.title: Too Late
toolate.message: If your last cup of coffee was less than 5 hours before you plan to go to sleep, regardless how many cups of coffee you drank.

okayish.title: Okayish
okayish.message: If you drank 6 or 7 cups of coffee and the last one was more than 6 hours before you plan to go to sleep or if you drank 5 cups of coffee or less and the last one was 5 hours or more before you plan to go to sleep.
